title: LoganConvict
body:
Hello Mr Rutledge.
Logan: First you come into my home.
Logan: And now I'm dragged in here!?
Logan: What is this about?
I believe you killed Mr Wright Logan.
The arguement got heated, you punched Mr Wright.
But you didn't stop there...
Logan: This is absurd!
You drew a weapon and shot Mr Wright in the stomach.
The bullet passed through the window.
And now we're here.
What do you have to say for yourself?
Logan: Detective...
Logan: I didn't kill Jacob.
Logan: Sometimes I wanted to, yes.
Logan: But you've got the wrong man.
Save it for the court room, you know what you did.
